tensortrade.rewards.reward_scheme module¶

class tensortrade.rewards.reward_scheme.RewardScheme[source]¶

Bases: tensortrade.base.component.Component

property exchange¶

The exchange being used by the current trading environments. Setting the exchange causes the scheme to reset.

Return type

Exchange

abstract get_reward(current_step, trade)[source]¶
Parameters

  • current_step (int) – The environments’s current timestep.

  • trade (Trade) – The trade executed and filled this timestep.

Return type

float

Returns

A float corresponding to the benefit earned by the action taken this timestep.

registered_name = 'rewards'¶
reset()[source]¶

Optionally implementable method for resetting stateful schemes.
